title.value: О некоторых аспектах базовых технологий современной культуры земледелия
On some aspects of modern crop farming basic technologies

subject.value: mata©riel de mise en valeur du sol

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented research into the necessity of making composite tilling machines not breaking soil structure, dramatically reducing wind and water erosion of soils and allowing to carry out some technological one-pass operations reveals in the article. The existing ways of soil processing are analyzed and variants of solution to the problem are offered – the basic and superficial soil processing is provided with universal no-moulding chisel aggregates and as well with four-lane composite disc machines. The advantages of the offered constructions are shown and the data of research are cited. Studies and tests have shown that the main feature of the innovative technologies of soil tillage developed by the JSC 'Slavic Technology' is the qualitative and active fracturing the soil by auto-vibration of the main working bodies with the progressive moving of ADU aggregate units. This allows to form along the entire depth of soil layer treatment a patterned layer of soil which in turn allows the plant roots to penetrate deep into the smoothly to obtain fertilizers and moisture of underlying layers.
